statements.statement: SELECT SEARCH_TARGET_FLG FROM TM_PW_TRC_PROCESS WHERE LINE_CD = #lineCd# AND PROCESS_CD = #processCd# AND SEARCH_TARGET_FLG = 1 AND TRC_DISPLAY_FLG = 1

WITH MAX_HEADER AS ( SELECT MODEL_CD, SERIAL, LINE_CD, PROCESS_CD, WORK_CD, MAX(RECORD_NO) RECORD_NO FROM TT_PW_TRC_HEADER
TRUNC(RESULT_DT) >= #dtFrom#
TRUNC(RESULT_DT) <= #dtTo#
GROUP BY MODEL_CD, SERIAL, LINE_CD, PROCESS_CD, WORK_CD ) SELECT TH.MODEL_CD "modelCd", TH.MODEL_CD "productModelCd", NVL(DS.SERIAL7,TH.SERIAL) "serial", TH.SERIAL "serial6", TH.LINE_CD "lineCd", TH.PROCESS_CD "processCd", TH.WORK_CD "workCd", TH.RESULT_CD "resultCd", TR.RESULT_NM "resultNm", TH.RESULT_VAL1 "resultVal1", TH.RESULT_VAL2 "resultVal2", TH.RESULT_VAL3 "resultVal3", TH.RESULT_VAL4 "resultVal4", TH.RESULT_VAL5 "resultVal5", TH.RESULT_DT "resultDt" FROM TT_PW_TRC_HEADER TH LEFT OUTER JOIN MAX_HEADER MH ON TH.MODEL_CD = MH.MODEL_CD AND TH.SERIAL = MH.SERIAL AND TH.LINE_CD = MH.LINE_CD AND TH.PROCESS_CD = MH.PROCESS_CD AND TH.WORK_CD = MH.WORK_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TM_PW_TRC_RESULT TR ON TH.LINE_CD = TR.LINE_CD AND TH.PROCESS_CD = TR.PROCESS_CD AND TH.WORK_CD = TR.WORK_CD AND TH.RESULT_CD = TR.RESULT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TT_DI_SERIAL7 DS ON TH.MODEL_CD = DS.MODEL_CD AND TH.SERIAL = DS.SERIAL6
TRUNC(TH.RESULT_DT) >= #dtFrom#
TRUNC(TH.RESULT_DT) <= #dtTo#
(TH.MODEL_CD, TH.SERIAL) IN
(#serialsList[].productModelCd#, #serialsList[].serial6#)
TH.MODEL_CD IN
#modelCdList[]#
TH.LINE_CD = #lineCd#
TH.PROCESS_CD = #processCd#
TH.WORK_CD = #workCd#
TH.RECORD_NO = MH.RECORD_NO
ORDER BY TH.MODEL_CD, TH.SERIAL, TH.LINE_CD, TH.PROCESS_CD, TH.WORK_CD
